SEARCH
Package org.application.studentgroups

Interface IStudentGroupsService

All Known Implementing Classes:
StudentGroupsService
public interface IStudentGroupsService
Represents a service interface for managing StudentGroup entities. This interface defines the service operations that can be performed, specific to student group service.

  • Method Details

    • addStudentGroup

      StudentGroup addStudentGroup(String name, int year, StudentGroup.Type type) throws StudentGroupAdditionException, ValidationException
      Adds a new StudentGroup with the given name, year and type.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the new StudentGroup.
      year - The year of the new StudentGroup.
      type - The type of the new StudentGroup.
      Returns:
      The newly created StudentGroup.
      Throws:
      StudentGroupAdditionException - If the StudentGroup could not be added.
      ValidationException - If the provided name, year or type are invalid.

    • deleteStudentGroup

      boolean deleteStudentGroup(int studentGroupId) throws StudentGroupNotFoundException, StudentGroupDeletionFailed, ValidationException
      Deletes a StudentGroup with the given id.
      Parameters:
      studentGroupId - The id of the StudentGroup to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the StudentGroup was deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      StudentGroupNotFoundException - If the StudentGroup with the given id was not found.
      StudentGroupDeletionFailed - If the StudentGroup could not be deleted.
      ValidationException - If the provided id is invalid.

    • deleteStudentGroup

      boolean deleteStudentGroup(String name) throws StudentGroupDeletionFailed, ValidationException
      Deletes a StudentGroup with the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the StudentGroup to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the StudentGroup was deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      StudentGroupDeletionFailed - If the StudentGroup could not be deleted.
      ValidationException - If the provided name is invalid.

    • deleteAll

      boolean deleteAll() throws StudentGroupDeletionFailed
      Deletes all StudentGroup entities.
      Returns:
      True if all StudentGroup entities were deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      StudentGroupDeletionFailed - If the StudentGroup entities could not be deleted.

    • getStudentGroupById

      StudentGroup getStudentGroupById(int studentGroupId) throws StudentGroupNotFoundException, ValidationException
      Retrieves a StudentGroup by its ID.
      Parameters:
      studentGroupId - The id of the StudentGroup to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The StudentGroup with the given id.
      Throws:
      StudentGroupNotFoundException - If the StudentGroup with the given id was not found.
      ValidationException - If the provided id is invalid.

    • getStudentGroups

      List<StudentGroup> getStudentGroups()
      Retrieves all StudentGroup entities.
      Returns:
      A list of all StudentGroup entities.

    • getStudentGroupsByYear

      List<StudentGroup> getStudentGroupsByYear(int year)
      Retrieves all StudentGroup entities with the given year.
      Parameters:
      year - The year of the StudentGroup entities to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of all StudentGroup entities with the given year.

    • getStudentGroupsByType

      List<StudentGroup> getStudentGroupsByType(StudentGroup.Type type)
      Retrieves all StudentGroup entities with the given type.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
